Freeciv 3.1.90.6-dev wonders help (Multiplayer ruleset)

NameCost
Upkeep		Requirement
Obsolete by		More info
Cure For Cancer 400
0		 Genetic Engineering
None		 This stunning technological achievement makes two content citizens happy in all cities of all players who have researched Genetic Engineering. In the unlikely event where there are not enough content citizens to benefit from this effect in a city, the wonder applies to unhappy citizens (including those unhappy about military activity), making each content then happy. Requires knowledge of the technology Genetic Engineering. * Makes it possible to target the city building it with the action 'Help build Wonder'.
Manhattan Project 600
0		 Nuclear Fission
None		 Requires knowledge of the technology Nuclear Fission. * Allows all players with knowledge of Rocketry to build Nuclear units. * Makes it possible to target the city building it with the action 'Help build Wonder'.
United Nations 600
0		 Communism
None		 Creates a world senate that may prevent declarations of war in some circumstances. If any player's city is in revolt for more than two turns, that player's government falls. Requires knowledge of the technology Communism. * Makes it possible to target the city building it with the action 'Help build Wonder'.
